snippet: Negative buzz is surrounding "John Carter,'' a big-budget space adventure from Walt Disney Studios, with analysts worrying that it could very well underperform.
abstract: Negative buzz is surrounding "John Carter,'' a big-budget space adventure from Walt Disney Studios, with analysts worrying that it could very well underperform.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street smells blood in the water surrounding "John Carter," a space adventure from Walt Disney Studios that arrives in theaters on March 9.

headline.main: Space Adventure Film Is a Potential Trouble Spot for Disney
